name: Permian Resources Corporation
description: Permian Resources Corporation is a prominent energy company primarily engaged in the exploration and production of oil and natural gas in the Permian Basin of West Texas and New Mexico. Founded in 2021 through the merger of several key players in the energy sector, the company has rapidly established itself as a significant presence in the oil and gas industry. Permian Resources focuses on utilizing advanced drilling techniques and technologies to maximize resource extraction while maintaining a commitment to environmental stewardship and sustainable practices. The company operates a diversified portfolio of assets, which allows it to capitalize on the favorable geology of the Permian Basin while optimizing production efficiency and cost-effectiveness. With a strategic emphasis on operational excellence and innovation, Permian Resources aims to deliver value to its shareholders while contributing to the energy needs of the country. The company is dedicated to implementing best practices in safety and environmental responsibility, ensuring that its operations align with the highest industry standards. Through its commitment to sustainable development and community engagement, Permian Resources is positioned to play a vital role in the future of energy production.

seo.meta_title: Permian Resources Corporation | Energy Exploration and Production
seo.meta_description: Explore Permian Resources Corporation, a leader in oil and gas exploration in the Permian Basin. Learn about our commitment to sustainability, innovation, and operational excellence.

faq.question: What does Permian Resources Corporation do?
faq.answer: Permian Resources Corporation is engaged in the exploration and production of oil and natural gas in the Permian Basin.

faq.question: When was Permian Resources founded?
faq.answer: Permian Resources Corporation was founded in 2021.

faq.question: Where is Permian Resources headquartered?
faq.answer: Permian Resources is headquartered in Denver, Colorado, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Permian Resources?
faq.answer: David M. Mullen is the CEO of Permian Resources Corporation.
